Create a virtual shopping cart that can be accessed from anywhere with an internet connection, allowing users to save their favorite items and easily make purchases online.
Develop a smart shopping cart that uses machine learning to suggest products based on a user's purchase history and preferences.
Create a social shopping cart that allows users to share their carts with friends and family, making it easy to collaborate on purchases.
Develop a shopping cart that uses augmented reality to allow users to see how products would look in their home before making a purchase.
Create a shopping cart that uses blockchain technology to ensure secure and transparent transactions, giving users peace of mind when making purchases online.
